text: The Sunshine Boys is a 1975 American comedy movie directed by Herbert Ross and based on the 1972 play of the same name by Neil Simon. It stars George Burns, Walter Matthau, Richard Benjamin, Lee Meredith, F. Murray Abraham, Fritz Feld, Ron Rifkin, Carol Arthur. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1976. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross
title: The Sunshine Boys
